explanations.machine learning: The paper applies various clustering algorithms (k-means, k-Shape, etc.) to financial time series, which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.unsupervised learning: Clustering is a type of unsupervised learning, and the paper focuses on clustering financial time series without labeled data.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions using clustering methods (k-means, k-Shape, agglomerative hierarchical clustering, etc.) to redivide the Chinese stock market.
